resources.string: Accessibility service is an essential part of this app.

Based on your experience in the last 3 minutes, please rate the following three questions from 1 to 7, where 1 is strongly disagree, 2 is disagree, 3 is somewhat disagree, 4 is neither agree nor disagree, 5 is somewhat agree, 6 is agree and 7 is strong agree.
